column2: Security checks on the substrings of an unparsed URL are often vulnerable to bypassing.
column4: '[["example.com"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-020/examples/IncompleteUrlSubstringSanitization_BAD1.js:4:22:4:34"]]' can be anywhere in the URL, and arbitrary hosts may come before or after it.
